articles.title: Video shows drug's 'life-changing' effect on man with Parkinson's - BBC.com
articles.description: Damien Gath says the severe symptoms he has had for years have improved in a matter of days.
articles.content:
By Dan Martin, BBC News, East Midlands
A man living with Parkinson's has said a new drug has transformed his life in a matter of days.
